document_data.name: Medium Spider Venom
document_data.mainbody: '''Medium spider venom''' was a [[poison]] extracted from a medium-sized [[monstrous spider]].
document_data.Effect: Inflicted via wounding, medium spider venom sapped the strength of a victim, but they could recover from it with time.
document_data.Users: A [[dark stalker]] operating at the [[Tomb of Chonis]] in the [[1374|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]], coated his arrows in medium spider venom.
